trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestisce il **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento di un <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The FormsAuthenticationEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: Il delegato FormsAuthenticationEventHandler è definito per l' <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>evento della <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>classe.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: È possibile accedere il <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>evento del <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>classe specificando una subroutine denominata **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** nel file Global. asax dell'applicazione ASP.NET.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>costruisce una <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>mediante l'oggetto corrente dell'oggetto <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>e lo passa al **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object supplied to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>oggetto fornito per il **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento per impostare il <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>su un oggetto personalizzato <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: Se non si specifica un valore per il <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>proprietà durante il **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** viene utilizzato l'evento, l'identità fornita dal ticket di autenticazione form nel cookie o URL.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: Il **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** è solo l'evento generato quando l'autenticazione <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>è impostato su <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>e <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>è un modulo HTTP attivo per l'applicazione.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>
